title: Cant buy IP boosts (because of pre season coming up)
body: Im aware that yes IP is being chucked out the window very soon but as a new player, i can't buy IP boosts currently and i want to play ranked, and i can't as you need 10 champs to play in the first place and do not have any ip to get even 10 champs worth 450 ip..... is there anything being done about this because i worry im almost 30 with only 3 champs and won't be able to play ranked at all.

replies.body: IP Boosts have been disabled so players don't feel as though they've wasted currency on items that will no longer be usable. There are numerous other ways of getting champions unlocked like Hextech or RP, and there will always be more ranked seasons to take part in the next years!
